headerDisplay: This plugin works with Enphase Photovoltaic devices and are exposed to HomeKit as separate accessories and each needs to be manually paired. 1. Open the Home app on your device. 2. Tap the Home tab, then tap . 3. Tap *Add Accessory*, and select *I Don't Have a Code or Cannot Scan*. 4. Enter the Homebridge PIN, this can be found under the QR code in Homebridge UI or your Homebridge logs, alternatively you can select *Use Camera* and scan the QR code again.
footerDisplay: This plugin works with Enphase Photovoltaic devices which are available [here](https://github.com/grzegorz914/homebridge-enphase-envoy).

refreshInterval.title: Refresh interval (sec)
refreshInterval.description: Here set data refresh time in (sec).

disableLogInfo.title: Disable log info
disableLogInfo.description: This disable log info, all values and state will not be displayed in Homebridge log console.

envoyPasswd.title: Envoy password
envoyPasswd.description: Here set envoy password (only if U already changed default password).

envoyDevId.title: Envoy Device Id
envoyDevId.description: Here set envoy device Id, open http://envoy.local/backbone/application.js and search for *envoyDevId*

installerPasswd.title: Installer password
installerPasswd.description: Here set installer password, need to be generated, more info here: https://thecomputerperson.wordpress.com/2016/08/28/reverse-engineering-the-enphase-installer-toolkit/

powerProductionMaxDetected.title: Power production max detected
powerProductionMaxDetected.description: Here set *max production Power* in (W) at which You get notyfication message.

energyProductionLifetimeOffset.title: Energy production lifetime offset
energyProductionLifetimeOffset.description: Here set energy production *Offset* in (Wh) for lifetime energy if nedded.

powerConsumptionTotalMaxDetected.title: Total - Power consumption max detected
powerConsumptionTotalMaxDetected.description: Here set *consumption-total max Power* in (W) at which You get notification message.

energyConsumptionTotalLifetimeOffset.title: Total - Energy consumption lifetime offset
energyConsumptionTotalLifetimeOffset.description: Here set energy consumption *Offset* in (Wh) for lifetime total energy if nedded.

powerConsumptionNetMaxDetected.title: Net - Power consumption max detected
powerConsumptionNetMaxDetected.description: Here set *consumption-net max Power* in (W) at which You get notification message.

energyConsumptionNetLifetimeOffset.title: Net - Energy consumption lifetime offset
energyConsumptionNetLifetimeOffset.description: Here set energy consumption *Offset* in (Wh) for lifetime net energy if nedded.
